response.original_title: ⋆.˚ ☾⭒.˚ How do I cancel my Geek Squad subscription?
response.overview: To cancel your Geek Squad subscription, simply call 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638 and ask to end your plan.  If you want to stop your Geek Squad service — whether it’s a protection plan or tech-support membership — the most reliable way is to call 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638. When you ring up 1 — 888 — 844 — 3638, a representative will ask for your account information (like your plan ID or payment method) to locate your subscription.
response.title: ⋆.˚ ☾⭒.˚ How do I cancel my Geek Squad subscription?
